answers.answer: If you want to have a natural birth it takes the chance down also the contractions come at you fast have you talked to her about a sweep? Oray e try the castor oil you're progressed enough the contraction would still be rough but it's not potocin
I'll be induced because of my Gestational Diabetes... I am a FTM so I know nothing about it and have no experience..

question: I am officially 40 weeks today. The doctor gave me the go ahead to elect to be induced on Monday if baby doesn't arrive this weekend. I have nothing medically wrong that I need induced but the option was laid out there. He said my body is prepared enough.I'm 3cm dialated and 50% effaced as of yesterday afternoon.Just curious what other moms thought about being induced...?
title: Thoughts on inducing labor?
